        public CardChance peekChanceCard()

      • peekCommunityCard

        public CardCommunity peekCommunityCard()
        This method returns the CardCommunity object at the top of the communityDeck.
        Returns:
        It returns CardCommunity object
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        This method doesn't modify the communityDeck object. It just returns the top of it.
        Effects:
        The card which is at the top of deck will be returned.

      • pullPushChance

        public void pullPushChance()
        This method picks the card at the top of the deck and puts it to the bottom. After this method is called, the next card which will be picked will change.
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        It modifies the communityDeck.
        Effects:
        The card at the top of the deck is changed.

      • pullPushCommunity

        public void pullPushCommunity()
        This method picks the card at the top of the deck and puts it to the bottom. After this method is called, the next card which will be picked will change.
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        It modifies the communityDeck.
        Effects:
        The card at the top of the deck is changed.
